scripts.test: npm run test-serialization ; npm run test-api
scripts.test-serialization: rm -f transaction_fifo; mkfifo transaction_fifo; npx tsx src/get_transactions.ts & NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules jest serialization
scripts.test-api: npm run generate-cdl-definitions ; NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules jest api
scripts.generate-grammar-bundle: rm -f src/*ohm-bundle* && npx ohm generateBundles -e -t src/grammar.ohm && mv src/grammar.ohm-bundle* src/generated/
scripts.generate-cdl-definitions: tsc --declaration src/generated/out.ts ; mv src/generated/out.d.ts csl-types/cardano-data-lite.d.ts ; npm run cleanup-compilation-artifacts
scripts.cleanup-compilation-artifacts: rm -f src/**/*.d.ts ; rm -f src/**/*.js ; rm -f src/*.d.ts ; rm -f src/*.js ; npm run generate-grammar-bundle
